resources.string: What number am I thinking of?

User must choose a value. Then the user must guess a random value from 1 and the number they chose. The user must also input how many guesses they have. If the user guesses correctly then they win, but if they run out of guesses they lose.
You have guessed incorrectly :( Try Again
You have run out of guesses
Congrats you have guessed the correct value
